title: Framework, Cloud Nothings, Kenny Davis and Harry Bacharach
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes two local furniture makers Freddy Hill and Jason Radcliffe competing in the Spike TV show - Framework.  Plus we share Dan Polletta's interview with Dylan Baldi of Cloud Nothings as they return to Northeast Ohio for a concert at the Grog Shop later this week.  And local musicians Kenny Davis and Harry Bacharach team up for some jazzy duets in our Key Bank studio.
